summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to incur an indebtedness against the General Bond Road and Bridge Fund on account of the cost and expense of the improvement of Harvard Avenue North, and certain other streets and avenues, by the construction of watermains, repaving and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 4512, appropriating money therefor and repealing Ordinance No. 52995, approved May 18th, 1927.
